Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back BREAKFAST DAILY SAVE $654 PER COUPLE View gallery / Back Dewi Sri Pool Dewi Sri Massage Area Bali Dewi Sri Hotel &vert; Return flights • 7 Nights • Transfers • Breakfast Overview Inclusions Room Type Terms & Conditions Dewi Sri Hotel A great wee hotel tucked away within the tranquillity of lush, private gardens, offering a soothing mix of refined Balinese hospitality and service with modern amenities in the heart of Kuta. Grassy areas with ‘balés’ scattered around allow for a rejuvenating massage near the pool and swim-up pool bar. At poolside a weekly program of buffet evenings and live local music sets the vibe for the night. View more View less 7 nights + flights, transfers & breakfast from $ 1739 per person share twin Flying with Air New Zealand BREAKFAST DAILY SAVE $654 PER COUPLE Enquire now Sale Period : until 4pm on 14 Nov 25 or until sold out Deal Includes: Return Economy Class airfares flying Air New Zealand from Auckland, Wellington or Christchurch to Bali Add $150 per person return to fly from your nearest Air New Zealand serviced domestic airport Return airport to hotel transfers 7 nights accommodation Breakfast daily Wi-Fi Room Types Departs From Auckland Wellington Christchurch from Auckland Standard Room The Standard rooms are located in the main building from the ground floor to the third floor overlooking a luxuriant, manicured garden. Each room has a capacity for two adults or one adult and one child with an extra bed consisting of two single mattresses. Room facilities are Flat screen TV with 66 satellite channels, air-conditioning, telephone, block out curtains, luggage rack & private en suite. Auckland 7 night package from $1739 per person share twin Extra nights from $31 per person Travel 09 Apr - 19 Jun 26 Wellington 7 night package from $1739 per person share twin Extra nights from $31 per person Travel 09 Apr - 19 Jun 26 Christchurch 7 night package from $1739 per person share twin Extra nights from $31 per person Travel 09 Apr - 19 Jun 26 Auckland 7 night package from $1779 per person share twin Extra nights from $37 per person Travel 14 Jul - 31 Aug 26 Wellington 7 night package from $1779 per person share twin Extra nights from $37 per person Travel 14 Jul - 31 Aug 26 Christchurch 7 night package from $1779 per person share twin Extra nights from $37 per person Travel 14 Jul - 31 Aug 26 Auckland 7 night package from $1869 per person share twin Extra nights from $50 per person Travel 23 Nov - 03 Dec 25, 21 Jan - 18 Mar 26 Wellington 7 night package from $1869 per person share twin Extra nights from $50 per person Travel 23 Nov - 03 Dec 25, 21 Jan - 18 Mar 26 Christchurch 7 night package from $1869 per person share twin Extra nights from $50 per person Travel 23 Nov - 03 Dec 25, 21 Jan - 18 Mar 26 If the advertised room type doesn't suit, or you'd like to travel outside the advertised dates, please ask us for a customised quote below. Terms & Conditions Valid for new bookings until 4pm on 14 Nov 25 or until sold out • Prices are correct as at 28 Oct 25 • Prices are thereafter subject to change without notice until time of confirmation • Prices may vary due to a number of factors including tax and surcharge increases, exchange rate movements and availability • All travel must be commenced and completed as specified • Advertised package prices are based on return Economy Class airfares flying Air New Zealand from Auckland, Wellington or Christchurch to Bali. Flights from Wellington or Christchurch go via Auckland. A surcharge of NZD$25 per person applies to any outbound flight on a Friday or Saturday or inbound on a Saturday or Sunday. • Any additional nights accommodation required due to flight schedules are at the customers expense • Min/max stays apply • Some surcharges, closeouts and accommodation restrictions apply. Any hotel credits that are unused are not refundable, transferable & can’t be exchanged for cash. • Bedding configurations may vary on twin share options • Twin share is two adults sharing a room using existing bedding. Neypi Day: Note that no check-in or check-out is permitted on Neypi Day from 6:00am on 19 Mar 26 until 6:00am on 20 Mar 26 • Advertised prices are per person for cash or eftpos purchase only. Credit card fees will apply • Full payment is required at time of booking • Airfares are non-refundable, non-transferrable and name changes are not permitted. Airfares and accommodation are limited and subject to availability at time of booking • Please ask your House of Travel consultant for full details.
